channel.title: attack.t1485 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1485 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Run from a Zip File
item.description: Payloads may be compressed, archived, or encrypted in order to avoid detection

item.title: Overwrite Deleted Data with Cipher
item.description: Adversaries may destroy data and files on specific systems or in large numbers on a network to interrupt availability to systems, services, and network resources. Data destruction is likely to render stored data irrecoverable by forensic techniques through overwriting files or data on local and remote drives

item.title: Clipboard Collection with Xclip Tool
item.description: Detects attempts to collect data stored in the clipboard from users with the usage of xclip tool. Xclip has to be installed. Highly recommended using rule on servers, due to high usage of clipboard utilities on user workstations.

item.title: DD File Overwrite
item.description: Detects potential overwriting and deletion of a file using DD.

item.title: AWS EKS Cluster Created or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when an EKS cluster is created or deleted.

item.title: AWS EFS Fileshare Mount Modified or Deleted
item.description: Detects when a EFS Fileshare Mount is modified or deleted. An adversary breaking any file system using the mount target that is being deleted, which might disrupt instances or applications using those mounts.

item.title: Overwriting the File with Dev Zero or Null
Secure Deletion with SDelete
item.description: Detects renaming of file while deletion with SDelete tool.

item.title: Microsoft 365 - Unusual Volume of File Deletion
item.description: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported a user has deleted a unusual a large volume of files.

item.title: Sysinternals SDelete Delete File
item.description: Use of SDelete to erase a file not the free space
